I work for the discovery channel creating videos.
I am a savage.
I am stuck in the past due to remoteness.

content.text: Hey! I work for the discovery channel creating videos.
Oh, cool! What kind of videos do you create?
We mostly create videos about nature and the outdoors. I love getting to spend time in the wild and learn about new things.
That sounds like a really fun job! I love learning about new things too. I'm actually in college right now working on a biology degree.
Oh, that's awesome! I love biology. What's your favorite topic?
I'm really interested in genetics and how organisms evolve. I think it's fascinating how different species can adapt to their environment.
That's really cool! I'm more of a zoology person myself. I love learning about all the different animals in the world.
I love animals too! I have a pet cat named Mittens. She's a little ball of fur and she's always getting into trouble.
That sounds adorable! I love cats too. I have a cat named Oliver. He's a big old grump, but he's my best friend.
I'm glad to hear you have a cat! Cats are the best pets.
I agree! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is 1984. It's a really thought-provoking book about the dangers of totalitarianism.
I've heard of that book, but I've never read it. I'll have to check it out.
I highly recommend it! It's a classic for a reason.
